Cranston.Haven Brothers Diner:
41°49′26.5″N 71°24′45″W

Haven Brothers Diner in Providence, Rhode Island, is one of the oldest restaurants on wheels in America and was founded in 1893 (although their truck says 1888 ) as a horse drawn lunch wagon.


== History ==
In 1888, Anne Philomena Haven (1842—1912), a widowed immigrant, founded the diner business with the proceeds from her husband Patrick's life insurance policy. The "lunch cart" (as the family called it) was purchased in Worcester, Massachusetts.
